https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tqEFbGUgDLlbCuRdyWCRfzGL6xW.jpg On July 31, 1970, in Las Vegas, Nevada, Elvis Presley staged a triumphant return to the concert stage from which he had been absent for almost a decade. His series of concerts broke all box office records and completely reenergized the career of the King of Rock ‘n’ Roll. ELVIS: That's The Way It Is
